item.title: Laravel Tutorial
item.description: Laravel Tutorial https://qiita.com/sano1202/items/6021856b70e4f8d3dc3d s- http://localhost:10080/ Create New Project: feature/lsapp ref: https://github.com/bradtraversy/lsapp 1$ artisan --version 2Laravel Framework 7.8.1 3 4$ diff .env-example .env-lsapp 51,2c1,2 6< #COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=myproject 7< PROJECT_PATH=./src 8--- 9> COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=lsapp 10> PROJECT_PATH=./src-lsapp 114a5 12> APP_NAME=LSAPP 13 14$ make create-project 15docker-compose up -d --build 16docker-compose exec app composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel . 17docker-compose exec app composer require predis/predis 18sudo chown -R tkondoh:tkondoh ./src-lsapp 19 20$ make ps 21docker-compose ps 22 Name Command State Ports 23------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 24lsapp_app_1 docker-php-entrypoint php-fpm Up 0.

item.title: Laravel Setup
item.description: Laravel-v6 setup on docker refs: https://qiita.com/ucan-lab/items/17c806973e69792ada99#docker%E7%92%B0%E5%A2%83%E3%82%92%E6%A7%8B%E7%AF%89%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B spec: nginx mysql phpmyadmin node redis mailhog Setup files 1$ cd work-github 2$ git clone git@github.com:tkondoh1022/laravel-v6.git 3 4$ cd laravel-v6 5$ tree . 6. 7├── LICENSE 8├── Makefile 9├── README.md 10├── docker 11│ ├── ash 12│ │ ├── aliases.sh 13│ │ └── color_prompt.sh 14│ ├── mysql 15│ │ └── my.cnf 16│ ├── nginx 17│ │ └── default.conf 18│ └── php 19│ ├── Dockerfile 20│ ├── php.
